reviews.text:
# Session Meta
Date: 2025‑04‑18  
Participants: AO‑01, AO‑02, AO‑03  
Prototype Version: v0.7  

# Verbatim Highlights
• “It guessed ‘Catering’ instead of ‘Office Lunch’—close, but not perfect.”
reviews.reason_text: Session meta details and verbatim highlights are presented without enforcing any system behavior.

reviews.text:
{highlight}  
• “Why does the OCR freak out when the receipt is wrinkled?”
reviews.reason_text: Issue with OCR when receipt is wrinkled is a concern but not enforceable.

reviews.text:
{pain}  
• “Great job auto-categorising Amazon receipts; that saved me so much time!”
reviews.reason_text: User satisfaction with auto-categorizing receipts is an observation.

reviews.text:
{delight}  
• “Took forever to process a blurry receipt—made me retry three times.”
reviews.reason_text: Receipt processing issue is noted but not enforcing any behavior.

reviews.text:
{pain}  
• “Confused parking fees with transport expenses—not intuitive enough.”
reviews.reason_text: Confusion between parking fees and transport expenses is a pain point.

reviews.text:
{pain}  
• “Wish I could easily edit the category after it's processed—too many taps.”
reviews.reason_text: Desire to edit categories after processing is an observation.

reviews.text:
{pain}  
• “Loved the simplicity of the overview dashboard.”
reviews.reason_text: User appreciation for dashboard is an example.

reviews.text:
{highlight}  
• “It doesn’t recognize handwritten tips—annoying.”
reviews.reason_text: Issue with handwritten tips being annoying is a concern.

reviews.text:
{pain}  
• “Super handy to get instant totals by category at month-end.”
reviews.reason_text: Instant totals by category are appreciated but not enforcing any action.
Observed behavior of scanning button spammed is a concern.

reviews.text:
User dragged PDF instead of JPEG (auto‑converted?)  
2.
reviews.reason_text: Issue with PDF vs. JPEG conversion is an observation.

reviews.text: Spammed **“Re‑scan”** button
reviews.reason_text: Spammed 'Re-scan' button is observed.

reviews.text: 4× after mis‑tag.
reviews.reason_text: Mis-tagging issues are multiple and noted.

reviews.text: 3. Couldn’t quickly locate manual edit option; visibly frustrated.
reviews.reason_text: Difficulty locating manual edit is observed.

reviews.text: 4. AO‑02 repeatedly pressed category dropdown hoping for auto-suggestions.
reviews.reason_text: Repeating category dropdown is an observation.

reviews.text: 5. Skipped the onboarding tips instantly.
reviews.reason_text: Skipping onboarding tips is observed.

reviews.text: 6. Leave one step blank: “____
reviews.reason_text: Left step blank is a problem.

reviews.text: (TBD)”.
reviews.reason_text: (TBD)

reviews.text:
# Quick‑Win Ideas
- AI “fuzzy‑match” to map ‘Starbucs’→‘Starbucks’.
reviews.reason_text: AI fuzzy-match suggestion is an idea.

reviews.text: - Smart rules engine suggests GL code ✅/❌.
reviews.reason_text: - Smart rules engine suggests GL code ✅/❌.

reviews.text: - Allow one-tap edits directly from category results screen.
reviews.reason_text: Explicitly states an enforceable system behavior.

reviews.text:
[OPEN Q]  

# Next Steps
☐ Validate OCR edge cases (Owner: Dev)  
☐ Heuristic categorisation accuracy ≥ 90 % (Owner: Data)
reviews.reason_text: Checklist items for next steps, not a requirement.

reviews.text:
☐ Improve UI visibility for manual category edits (Owner: UX)  
☐ – leave one checkbox line empty
reviews.reason_text: Procedural instruction without enforceable behavior.
